title: The Cigar Authority Meets The Tax Authority... And The Authority on Everything Crap!!!
itunes:title: The Cigar Authority Meets The Tax Authority... And The Authority on Everything Crap!!!
description: Today on The Cigar Authority we're smoking La Fonta Consigliere and the Baccarat Dolce Far Niente. Today's guests include the boys from CrapCigar.com, and Dave's personal accountant Andy "Numbers" Nelson. It's time for the finer things in life... It's time for The Cigar Authority!
